column5: Has anyone ever fished this lake with Air Ivanhoe? There is very little information on this lake other than a brief description on air ivanhoe's website. I was hoping maybe someone on the site has been there and could tell me a little bit about it. Thanks!

I have not fished Atekepi Lake but have been on a few fly in trips with Air Ivanhoe and have never been disappointed George Jenne and Joel run a top notch operation we were always treated well and the fishing was awesome.Cheers Mitch....
Thanks for your reply. I have read nothing but glowing reviews for their outfitting service. Which lakes have you fished with them? I was also looking at Lincoln, Sherlock, Shawmere and Sahler.
Hey there j.newsom a PM has been sent.
